description: The elegant Hamon is Ramba Ral`s aide and lover, who coordinates her man`s guerilla stratagems from the bridge of the hovercraft Gallop. Despite her flirtatious nature - she even sets her sights on young Amuro at one point - Hamon is passionately devoted to Ramba Ral, and ultimately leads the surviving members of their team in a final attempt to avenge her lover`s defeat.
name: Crowley Hamon
